text: okay getting ready to get the drill loaded up and set up to reseed the grass hay pasture um adjusted the depth of the gauge wheels and the disc openers it's a half inch and then let's go up here and show you this so i've mixed together oats and grass pasture seed i forget what the varieties are there's some fescue timothy some other and then there's the leftover wheat still in the bottom of the drill i'll kind of sort it all together i gotta say i love the feeling of just running your fingers through all the seed i have enough to do about three four acres here saved the uh seed from the last time i did this uh earlier in the spring and then in the grass seed box is clover seed medium red clover [Music] up here in the grass seed box and there's still some leftover berseem clover frosty bursting clover from when i was uh drilling the wheat so that's what's to come and down there in a pallet there's 11 bags left of the 295 that i had of wheat spring wheat so got a neighbor who uh says he'll buy him from me for half price over there dog and uh the corn pallet of corn we've been waiting to plant in about two weeks so that's it for this one oh i've got to uh pull the grain cart out and the trailer behind the tractor so i've got some projects here in the next couple days thanks for watching we'll see you soon bye
